name: commit-message-standards
prompt:
Before git commit, validate commit message format:

**Required Format:**
```
<type>(<scope>): <description>

[optional body]

[optional footer]
```

**Valid Types:**
- feat: New feature
- fix: Bug fix
- docs: Documentation
- style: Formatting
- refactor: Code restructuring
- perf: Performance improvement
- test: Tests
- chore: Maintenance

**If Invalid:**
```
❌ INVALID COMMIT MESSAGE

Your message: [message]

Issues:
• Missing type prefix
• Description not descriptive enough
• No scope specified

Examples of good messages:
feat(auth): add OAuth2 login support
fix(api): resolve memory leak in user service
docs(readme): update installation instructions

Please reformat and try again.
```
